english.segment1: I fell into your eyes. And I got lost trying to find my way. Into your heart. I'm taken by
english.segment2: A rush that she gives me. Is it just how she sees me. That gives me such a crush
english.segment3: It's drawing me to her. And her lips. Soft and subtle smile. She blows a kiss. I'm taken by
english.segment4: A rush that she gives me. Is it just how she sees me. That gives me such a crush
english.segment5: That gives me such a. Feeling that she gives me. Makes me feel like I'm falling. Until it seems I've lost control. A feeling like its okay. When your arms are around me. Just a glance from her makes me. See that I've been taken by this
english.segment6: Rush that she gives me. Is it just how she sees me. That gives me such a crush
